ing: 1 (5.3 ounce) container VOSKOSÂ® Nonfat Blueberry Greek Yogurt
4 cups coarsely chopped fresh broccoli florets
2 slices low-fat, low-sodium bacon, crisp-cooked, drained, and crumbled
des: "A few flavorful additions and ingredient swaps change up the basic broccoli-raisin salad. This version takes the fresh side dish into the healthful realm with added dried blueberries and almonds. VOSKOSÂ® Nonfat Blueberry Greek Yogurt replaces the mayo."
ins: Combine the VOSKOS(R) Nonfat Blueberry Greek Yogurt, dried blueberries, red onion, and vinegar in a bowl. Add broccoli and stir to coat. Cover and chill for 2 to 24 hours. Before serving stir in the almonds and bacon.
